document.full_text: connecticut is considering holding back students born after oct. 1, a process known as redshirting, so they won't be overwhelmed by peers who have already turned 5.
document.title: too young for kindergarten? tide turning against 4-year-olds
lines_and_colors: connecticut is considering holding back students born after oct. 1, a process known as redshirting, so they won't be overwhelmed by peers who have already turned 5.
